Dear ${object.name},

Thank you for taking the time to meet with our team about the ${object.job_id.name} at PPTS.It was a pleasure to learn more about your skills and accomplishments.

Unfortunately, our team did not select you for further consideration.

I would like to note that competition for jobs at PPTS is always strong and that we often have to make difficult choices between many high-caliber candidates. Now that we’ve had the chance to know more about you, we will be keeping your resume on file for future openings that better fit your profile.

I am happy to answer your questions if you would like any specific feedback about your application or interviews.

Thanks again for your interest in PPTS and best of luck with your job search.

Regards,

HR - Talent Acquisition Team
Thank you for Job interest with PPTS

Dear ${object.name},

We appreciate your interest in PPTS and the time you’ve invested in applying for the ${object.job_id.name} opening.

We ended up moving forward with another candidate, but we’d like to thank you for talking to our team and giving us the opportunity to learn about your skills and accomplishments.

We will be advertising more positions in the coming months. We hope you’ll keep us in mind and we encourage you to apply again.

We wish you good luck with your job search and professional future endeavors.

Regards,

HR - Talent Acquisition Team

Dear ${object.name}

We take great pleasure in inviting you to join the family of Point Perfect Transcription Services (India) Private Limited. Your terms of employment would be as follows:

Designation : ${object.job_id.name or ''}
Monthly CTC : CTC.
Date of Joining :
Probation Period : 6 Months from Date of Joining

In case of any further information required on your job profile, salary, or any policy, kindly contact the undersigned. This is a letter of offer and your formal letter of appointment shall be provided at the time of your joining. As a part of our joining process, you are requested to bring the following documents on the day of joining.

Documents to be submitted:

.All Academic certificates – One photocopy of each

.Offer, Appointment, Confirmation, Promotions (If any), Service/Relieving Certificate, Pay Slip(s) and No due certificate from all your previous employers.

.One address proof and Id proof

.Four passport size and two stamp size photographs

.Medical Fitness Certificate

We look forward to you having a long and fruitful relationship with Point Perfect Transcription Services India Private Limited.

Please note that the offer of appointment is subject to satisfactory completion of your reference check and verification of the documents submitted by you.

With Best Regards,,

Manager - HRD
